summary: REQ-25 appears implemented: the first Visual Trust image now uses the specified external URL directly (not via getGeneratedAssetUrl), while the remaining images still use generated asset filenames through getGeneratedAssetUrl and the ImageWithFallback/grid structure remains the same. Two additional non-requested files were modified.

hallucinated_features.description: Modified project metadata/state file without being requested in the BuildRequest.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest only calls for updating the first image source URL in VisualTrustSection and explicitly constrains changes to that behavior; it does not request changes to project_state.json.

hallucinated_features.description: Modified frontend file summary documentation without being requested in the BuildRequest.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest does not request updating documentation/summary files; only the VisualTrust first image src change is required.
